mapper.select: select bg.guestbookId, bg.publisher, bg.createTime, bg.content, bum.nickName, bum.avatar from blog_guestbook as bg left join blog_user_means as bum on bg.publisher = bum.uid order by bg.createTime DESC
mapper.delete: delete from blog_guestbook where publisher = #{uid} and guestbookId = #{guestbookId}
